overview: She's been framed, shamed and thrown in jail for a crime she never committed. But Tori Welles is going to have the ultimate sexual revenge, and its going to be sweet! From white-hot lesbian lust behind bars to a sizzling court room scene of juicy judicial justice, Tori is Trouble! Join her on a nonstop sexual quest to nail the man who fingered her. And you know TORI...she always gets her man!
title: Trouble
